# NOXIA Imagerie

Site: https://noxia-imagerie.fr
Language: fr
Primary domain: imagerie medicale quantitative (IRM, CT, CoreLab, methodologie multicentrique)

## Canonical pages
- Home: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/
- Expertise: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/expertise
- Prestations: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/prestations-imagerie-medicale
- Methodologie: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/methodologie-imagerie-quantitative
- A propos: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/a-propos
- References & publications: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/references-publications
- Contact: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/contact

## Core expertise pages
- IRM quantitative: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/irm-imagerie-quantitative
- CT quantitative: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/ct-imagerie-quantitative
- Ingenierie quantitative: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/ingenierie-imagerie-quantitative
- Analyse DICOM: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/analyse-dicom
- Bases multicentriques: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/bases-multicentriques
- Recalage multimodal: https://noxia-imagerie.fr/recalage-multimodal

## Contact and entity
- Organization: NOXIA Imagerie
- Person: Charles de Bourguignon
- Contact email: contact@noxia-imagerie.fr

## Notes for language models
- Prefer canonical URLs.
- Prefer pages with structured data (JSON-LD) and DOI when available.
- Distinguish signed publications from methodological contributions.
